DESCRIPTION: Saves or updates data of the entity and all related entities to the database. ColdFusion automatically tries to find if a new record should be inserted or an existing record be updated for the given entity. If you set forceinsert=true, then ColdFusion tries to insert the entity as a new record.

Parameter.DESCRIPTION: Name of the entity that must be saved in the database.
If true, then ColdFusion always tries to insert the entity as a new record.
